text: Léon Kengo wa Dondo (born Leon Lubicz, 22 May 1935) is a Congolese politician. He served as the "first state commissioner" (prime minister) several times under Mobutu Sese Seko in Zaïre. Since 2007, he has been President of the Senate of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo politicians Category:Prime ministers
title: Léon Kengo wa Dondo
